```{r fig.height=20, fig.width=30}

beer_data %>% distinct(Style)


notnull <- beer_data %>% filter(is.na(IBU)) %>% distinct(Style)


isnull <- beer_data %>% filter(!is.na(IBU)) %>% distinct(Style, IBU) %>% arrange(Style)

styles <- notnull %>% 
          full_join(isnull, by = "Style") %>% arrange(Style)


#styles %>% filter(!is.na(IBU))

styles %>%
  group_by(Style) %>%
  summarise_all(funs(count=n(), min(IBU), max(IBU), mean(IBU), median(IBU), sd(IBU)))
  #select_if(function(x) any(is.na(x))) %>%
  #summarise_all(funs(sum(is.na(.))))

ggplot(styles, aes(x=Style, y=IBU)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    theme(text = element_text(size=10),
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle=90, hjust=1)) 




```
